description:
Gamers need to get out in the sun sometimes too! Grab the Vert Swimsuit Outfit and spear any 2D enemy that gets in her way!

Note: Players can access the Vert Swimsuit Outfit by going to the Menu and scrolling to the Equipment section. The Vert Swimsuit Outfit is purely cosmetic and is visible during battle, cut scenes, and exploration segments with Neptune. Mix-n-match with the animal sets for fun!
name: Vert Swimsuit Outfit
